Detailed Description

All-or-nothing assignment for bush-based algorithms.

In the case of bush-based methods, AON has to iterate through all nodes, not only destination nodes to calculate minimum and maximum costs.

Member Function Documentation

Origin *  origin 
)
protectedvirtual
Returns
always zero, for bush-based methods we do not calculate total minimum time.

Implements AONAssignment.
